strings.string: Our king is in danger, you have to save him! Go to castle now!
You have to get a magic weapon! Someone told me that there used to be a wizard living in that house a the other side of the river If you can find an arrow to shoot that orb, you may bekldf
Cette pierre semble pouvoir se briser.
You found a Bow! You can shoot now enemies and distant objects with it You can buy arrows from the village shop
Hmm... This seems to be locked. I need to find a key to open it
Cette pierre semble pouvoir se déplacer.
Bonjour, bienvenu au centre Pokémon ! Nous allons soigner vos icmons, veuillez patientez un instant
Merci de votre patience, vos icmons ont retrouvé la forme ! A bientôt
Bonjour, que puis-je faire pour vous ? Cliquez sur E pour shopper
